Projects

A list of projects that I was involved throughout the years.

RcppDeepState

A simple package to fuzz test code in Rcpp packages

Year started: 2022

Year ended: Ongoing

RcppDeepState, a simple way to fuzz test compiled code in Rcpp packages. This package extends the DeepState framework to fully support Rcpp based packages.

You can find more information here

R-integration

Simple Node JS module to interact with a pre-installed R compiler

Year started: 2020

Year ended: Ongoing

The R-integration API allows to execute arbitrary R commands or scripts directly from the node JS environment. This integration works on Windows and GNU/Linux based systems and uses system calls to access the R binary.

You can find more information here

Standalone Stellar Blockchain

A ready-to-use setup of a standalone Stellar blockchain based on Docker.

Year started: 2022

Year ended: 2022

Docker-compose implementation of a Stellar validator node that runs on a fully private blockchain, separated from the “public” and “test” one.

You can find more information here

LR(0) Automa generator

Parsing automa generator written in C++ created as final project for the ”Formal Languages and Compilers” course at University of Trento.

Year started: 2021

Year ended: 2021

Parsing automa generator written in C++ created as final project for the ”Formal Languages and Compilers” course at University of Trento.

You can find more information here
